name: Gangster Town: Vice District
description:
Welcome to the gangster town! Make yourself comfortable, the criminal world is waiting for you!
Open up the city full of different gangster bands, and take your chance to complete missions:
Different ways to have fun
• Kill bad guys;
• Shoot from the wide range of military weaponry: bazooka, ak-47 etc.;
• Smash bandits with a golf club;
• Drive monster truck through the crowds;
• Try cool stunts on a helicopter;
• Win the races, mad drifting and crazy tricks are waiting for you;
• Deliver important goods and complete another quests;
• Slaughter enemies and car thefts to get achievements;

The shop
• Great choice of guns to arm yourself;
• Cars, bikes, the military tank and the helicopter, try it all;
• Clothes and accessories to boost your stats;

The game brings you to the streets full of crime. There are mafia, cops and solders, don’t let them rule the town. They should pay with their blood!

You’re the hero who can became the best racer, auto thief and powerful fighter. Begin now! Start your exciting adventure.
